name: NABARD Rural Infrastructure Development Fund
description: Provides financial assistance for rural infrastructure projects.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund
description: Provides medium - long term debt financing for investment in viable projects for post-harvest management Infrastructure and community farming assets.

name: Micro Irrigation Fund
description: Provides funds for micro irrigation projects.

name: Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund
description: Provides finance for the development of fisheries infrastructure.

name: National Bamboo Mission
description: Supports the development of the bamboo sector.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana - Remunerative Approaches for Agriculture and Allied sector Rejuvenation
description: Provides financial assistance to enhance farmers income.

name: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance for dairy projects.

name: Gramin Bhandaran Yojana
description: Provides support for the construction and renovation of rural godowns.
